[00278] RhuMAb Beta7 (etrolizumab) is a humanized monoclonal antibody based on the human IgGl subgroup III VH, K subgroup-I VL consensus sequences and is directed specifically against the β7 subunit of the integrin heterodimer. See Figs. 1 A and B. It has been shown to bind with high affinity to α4β7 (Kd of about 116 pM) and αΕβ7 (Kd of about 1800 pM).
